remarks.para: One may be inoperative open provided:

numlitem.para: Associated oil seal is not leaking, and
Repairs are made within three flight days.

Confirm that the Oil Seal is not leaking by checking the EICAS status page. If the ENG OIL SEAL message is displayed, the seal is leaking and dispatch is not permitted. If the OIL SCAV VAL message is displayed, dispatch is not permitted.
No dispatch with OIL SCAV VAL or ENG OIL SEAL message displayed.

placard.para: Placard near EICAS "#4 BEARING SCAVENGE VALVE INOP OPEN, ENG NO. ______" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
